rules_text:
Enchant artifact or creature
Enchanted permanent loses all abilities and doesn’t untap during its controller’s untap step.
When this enchantment enters, tap enchanted permanent, then discover 3. [i](Exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card with mana value 3 or less. Cast it without paying its mana cost or put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom in a random order.)[/i]
